description: Does a great job at syncing stuff between Ubuntu and my Win10 laptop (tried via Google Drive). Fancy highlighter and overall a good, clean UI.
I refuse to give my cloud credentials to a 3rd party, closed-source project.
Got here via the mac version, auto syncing notes between the two works nicely. Simple interface which is good. One missing thing is maybe tables, would be nice to see that in the future.

it has potential, but very wonky. sometimes i click things and i cant type after inserting a drawing. i cant automatically rescale down a drawing to my note. please add a way to highlight texts and change colors. bullets don't follow formatting when you press enter.. it goes back to default small fonts. its great, but very wonky
summary: color scheme is bad. brown on black. black on white. it hurts my eyes
